body: https://hentaitranscripts.blogspot.com/2021/04/328238.html english translation (only the transcript not the scanlation) of chapter 1 done by me feel free to use it in scanlation or read it while waiting for a scanlation long story short our guy choses Truck kun over his girlfriend

i want this to be a story were the MC gets this power and works out a way to win... but given the audience and will the record shows that all he'll do is let her get raped in different places with different people and it'll end with one of the guys that raped her (or some outside force thats been watching the whole time) explain that they did this purely as a gag or to torture the MC cus thats NTR
